CARD-CRITICAL-SLASHING-1-TEXT: Normal damage and target suffers from humiliation and may only attack you (%SAVE-CRITICAL=Will negates%)
CARD-CRITICAL-SLASHING-2-TEXT: Normal damage and target loses 1d3 fingers and takes 1 %ABILITY-CON=Con% and %ABILITY-STR=Str% %ability-drain=drain% (%SAVE-CRITICAL=Fort negates%)
CARD-CRITICAL-SLASHING-3-TEXT: Double damage and all critical threats against target automatically confirm for the next 3 rounds
CARD-CRITICAL-SLASHING-4-TEXT: Double damage and push target 1 square in any direction
CARD-CRITICAL-SLASHING-7-TEXT: Double damage and target takes a -2 penalty to AC for 1d4 rounds
CARD-CRITICAL-SLASHING-8-TEXT: Normal damage and 8 %STATUS-BLEED=bleed%. A successful Heal check cuts the bleeding in half, rather than ending it
CARD-CRITICAL-SLASHING-9-TEXT: Normal damage and 1 %ABILITY-CON=Con% %ABILITY-DAMAGE=damage%. Target cannot speak or bite %UNTIL-HEALED=until healed%
CARD-CRITICAL-SLASHING-10-TEXT: Normal damage and 1d2 %ABILITY-DEX=Dex% %ABILITY-DAMAGE=damage% and target is knocked %STATUS-PRONE=prone%
CARD-CRITICAL-SLASHING-11-TEXT: Normal damage and 1 %ABILITY-CON=Con% and %ABILITY-CHA=Cha% %ABILITY-DAMAGE=damage%. -2 penalty on Spot, 1 Search and ranged attacks %UNTIL-HEALED=until healed%
CARD-CRITICAL-SLASHING-12-TEXT: Double damage and 1d4 %STATUS-BLEED=bleed%. Target cannot swallow whole
CARD-CRITICAL-SLASHING-13-TEXT: Double damage and target loses flight if it uses wings
CARD-CRITICAL-SLASHING-14-TEXT: Normal damage and 1 %ABILITY-CHA=Cha% %ability-drain=drain%. -4 penalty on Listen check %UNTIL-HEALED=until healed%
CARD-CRITICAL-SLASHING-15-TEXT: Normal damage and target provokes attacks of opportunity from all threatening opponents
CARD-CRITICAL-SLASHING-17-TEXT: Normal damage and 2d6 %STATUS-BLEED=bleed%. Target cannot talk or breathe while bleeding
CARD-CRITICAL-SLASHING-18-TEXT: Double damage and +4 to your AC for 1 round
CARD-CRITICAL-SLASHING-19-TEXT: Triple damage, but you drop your weapon
CARD-CRITICAL-SLASHING-21-TEXT: Normal damage and -4 penalty on attack rolls, skill checks and ability checks for 1d4 rounds
CARD-CRITICAL-SLASHING-22-TEXT: Normal damage and target loses hand and takes 1d3 %ABILITY-CON=Con% and %ABILITY-STR=Str% %ability-drain=drain% (%SAVE-CRITICAL=Fort negates%)
CARD-CRITICAL-SLASHING-23-TEXT: Triple damage but all damage is nonlethal
CARD-CRITICAL-SLASHING-24-TEXT: Double damage and one free attack against the target with a -5 penalty
CARD-CRITICAL-SLASHING-30-TEXT: Normal damage and 1 %ABILITY-DEX=Dex% %ABILITY-DAMAGE=damage%. Target cannot use one hand %UNTIL-HEALED=until healed%
CARD-CRITICAL-SLASHING-31-TEXT: Double damage and target is disarmed (1 item)
CARD-CRITICAL-SLASHING-32-TEXT: Double damage and target can take only one move or standard action next round
CARD-CRITICAL-SLASHING-33-TEXT: Double damage and normal damage to target's weapon
CARD-CRITICAL-SLASHING-34-TEXT: Double damage and you may automatically grapple the target
CARD-CRITICAL-SLASHING-35-TEXT: Double damage and +2 on all your attack rolls for 1 round
CARD-CRITICAL-SLASHING-36-TEXT: Double damage and 1 %STATUS-BLEED=bleed%. Target gains 20% spell failure chance for verbal spells %UNTIL-HEALED=until healed%
CARD-CRITICAL-SLASHING-37-TEXT: Normal damage and target is %STATUS-SICKENED=sickened% for 1d6 rounds
CARD-CRITICAL-SLASHING-38-TEXT: Normal damage and target permanently %STATUS-BLINDED=blinded% (%SAVE-CRITICAL=Ref negates%)
CARD-CRITICAL-SLASHING-39-TEXT: Normal damage and 1d3 %ABILITY-CHA=Cha% %ABILITY-DAMAGE=damage% and 1 %ABILITY-CHA=Cha% %ability-drain=drain% (%SAVE-CRITICAL=Fort negates% drain)
CARD-CRITICAL-SLASHING-40-TEXT: Double damage and target is pushed 1d6 squares directly away
CARD-CRITICAL-SLASHING-42-TEXT: Double damage and double armor check penalty until fixed (DC 15 Craft)
CARD-CRITICAL-SLASHING-45-TEXT: Normal damage and target takes %STATUS-BLEED=bleed% damage equal to your normal damage
CARD-CRITICAL-SLASHING-46-TEXT: Normal damage and 1d4 %STATUS-BLEED=bleed%. Target %STATUS-BLINDED=blinded% while bleeding
CARD-CRITICAL-SLASHING-47-TEXT: Double damage and target is knocked %STATUS-PRONE=prone%
CARD-CRITICAL-SLASHING-49-TEXT: Double damage and normal damage to target's shield
CARD-CRITICAL-SLASHING-50-TEXT: Double damage and normal damage to target's armor
CARD-CRITICAL-SLASHING-51-TEXT: Double damage and one free attack against an adjacent foe at the same bonus
CARD-CRITICAL-SLASHING-52-TEXT: Normal damage and target is %STATUS-FLAT-FOOTED=flat-footed% for 1 round
